main.first-paragraph: I'm glad you want to use this Warhammer Fantasy RolePlay NPC generator app.
main.second-paragraph: This application will enable you to quickly generate a random character for your WFRP session. Whether you need a courageous human, a stout dwarf, a reclusive elf or a jovial halfling, the app will generate a stat block alongside the basic visual characteristics of a character.
main.third-paragraph: This is a passion project created by a fan for other fans. I am making this app in my spare time as means of self-development, so please keep that in mind when asking about new features or reporting bugs.
main.fourth-paragraph: I intend on expanding this application until it reaches version 1.0, at which point it will be completed and no further development should be expected.
main.roadmap-point4: add character archetypes to generation parameters
main.fifth-paragraph: If you wish to see some feature added or would like to report a bug, please feel free to contact me using the contact form.
